text: Hey everyone! I'm curious, is there a way to automate cloning templates through the API? An app that links two portals, fetches templates/modules from one and clones them to the other? (Rather than going into Design Manager and using Clone to portal).
yes theoretically it is completely possible
haven’t done it though so I don’t have much to add

yes <@UBUNBSM24>, if no direct api, then we can get the template and then create the template, those endpoints are already available
`<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/templates/get_templates_template_id>`
`<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/templates/post_templates>`
Thanks! I took a quick look at the API but wasn't sure if those endpoints would work.

I have templates/modules I'd like to share with people without having to have them grant me access to their portal, me going in and manually cloning them. I'm considering hiring someone to build an app whereby the user can authorise access to their portal and get the module added automatically if possible (marketplace style). I could then use that as an inbound marketing strategy (sign up and get X module/email template) or something.
